scenario_text.value: Takuma! I finished them off good!

Yeah, it worked out pretty well, given it was
just the two of us.
Heheh, that’s all thanks to you, Takuma!

(It feels like consoling a little kid after
they had a scary dream. Kinda embarrassing.)

(If Agumon’s a reflection of my heart, then
his sudden anxiety might’ve been my own.)

(Humans tend to make each other anxious. I’ll
be careful not to overthink myself.)
